settings.filter.initMapAddress.label: Init Address for Map if shown

settings.filter.initMapZoom.label: Init Zoom factor for Map (1= world - 15 one street) default 4

settings.filter.onlineMapZoom.label: Zoom factor for Map (1= world - 15 one street) if City: Online is selected

settings.filter.doubleclickzoom.label: Zoom factor for Map (1= world - 15 one street) when user Double clicks, default 10
